SELECT tst.*, tstp.name packageName FROM t_sys_tenant tst LEFT JOIN t_sys_tenant_package tstp ON tst.package_id = tstp.id
tst.is_deleted=0
AND tst.name LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{filter.name} , '%' )
ORDER BY tst.sort ASC, tst.create_time DESC

SELECT id, name FROM t_sys_tenant
is_deleted=0 AND status=1
AND name LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{filter.name} , '%' )
AND package_id = #{filter.packageId}

select CONCAT('update ', r.TABLE_NAME, ' set is_deleted = 1 where tenant_id in ( ', #{tenantId}, ' );') from (SELECT re.*, count(1) count from ( SELECT t.TABLE_NAME FROM information_schema.TABLES t join information_schema.COLUMNS c on (t.TABLE_NAME = c.TABLE_NAME and c.COLUMN_NAME in ( 'is_deleted', 'tenant_id' ) ) WHERE t.table_schema = #{tableSchema} GROUP BY t.TABLE_NAME, c.COLUMN_NAME ) re GROUP BY re.TABLE_NAME) r where r.count > 1
